original_text: Then I saw another animal. It seemed like a leopard, but it had four wings on its back. They were like a bird's wings. This animal had four heads. It received authority to rule.
korean_text: 그 후에 내가 또 본즉 다른 짐승 곧 표범과 같은 것이 있는데 그 등에는 새의 날개 넷이 있고 그 짐승에게 또 머리 넷이 있으며 권세를 받았더라

sentences.original_text: but it had four wings on its back.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것의 등에는 네 개의 날개가 있었다.

sentences.original_text: They were like a bird's wings.

sentences.korean_translation: 이 짐승은 네 개의 머리를 가졌다.
